is-primitive

Returns true if the value is a primitive.

Install with npm

bash npm i is-primitive --save

Running tests

Install dev dependencies.

bash npm i -d && npm test

Usage

```js var isPrimitive = require(‘is-primitive’); isPrimitive(‘abc’); //=> true

isPrimitive(42); //=> true

isPrimitive(false); //=> true

isPrimitive(true); //=> true

isPrimitive({}); //=> false

isPrimitive([]); //=> false

isPrimitive(function(){}); //=> false ```
